participant_1.background:
I wake up early to feed my cats and then work on my laptops until it's time to get ready for my wedding in the park.
my favorite french fries are from mcdonald.
I am not married, but I do enjoy online shopping and collecting memories from my vacations.
I enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature.
i am colour blind.

content.text: I love to shop online and collect memories from my vacations. I am not married, but I do enjoy quiet activities in my free time, like reading, writing, and spending time in nature. I am colour blind.

I am pretty close with my family. I like to create websites and hike. I don't care what the weather is as long as I get to wear my pink hiking boots. I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
That's awesome! What are some things you enjoy writing about?
I like to write about my everyday life and things I've experienced. I also like to write short stories about my friends and family.
That's great! I love to write as well. I usually write about my travels and experiences in different countries.
That's really cool! I've always wanted to travel the world but haven't had the chance yet.
You should definitely try to travel sometime soon! It's an amazing experience.
I will! Thanks for the advice.
No problem! I'm always happy to talk about travel.
What's your favorite thing about traveling?
I love meeting new people and learning about different cultures.
That's great! I love that too. It's so interesting to learn about different ways of life.
Me too! I think traveling is one of the best ways to learn about the world.
